directions.step:
From: arielle@bonkers.taronga.com (Stephanie da Silva)
Date: Sat, 22 Apr 1995 11:28:04 GMT Cream honey and butter, mixing until well blended. Stir in flowers. Use on pancakes, waffles or muffins. Store in refrigerator.
